trans-unit.source: Specifies the rows or columns that are resized by a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Especifica as linhas ou colunas que são redimensionadas por um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
trans-unit.target: Essa enumeração é usada para definir o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: Space is redistributed based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment*> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment*> properties.
trans-unit.target: Espaço é redistribuído com base no valor da <> </> *> e <> </> *> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> property specifies that space is redistributed between rows, the redistribution follows these guidelines: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top>, space is redistributed between the row that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> and the row that is above that row.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>propriedade especifica que o espaço é redistribuído entre linhas, a redistribuição segue estas diretrizes: - quando o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>estiver definida como <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top>, espaço é redistribuído entre a linha especificada para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>e a linha que está acima da linha.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Bottom>, space is redistributed between the row that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> and the row that is below that row.
trans-unit.target: -Quando o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>estiver definida como <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Bottom>, espaço é redistribuído entre a linha especificada para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>e a linha que está abaixo da linha.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Bottom> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center>, space is redistributed between the row that is above and the row that is below the row that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
trans-unit.target: -Quando a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>propriedade é definida, o <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center>espaço é redistribuído entre a linha que está acima e a linha que está abaixo da linha que é especificada para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>, space is redistributed between the row that is above and the row that is below the row that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
trans-unit.target: -Quando a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>propriedade é definida, o <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>espaço é redistribuído entre a linha que está acima e a linha que está abaixo da linha que é especificada para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> property specifies that space is redistributed between columns, the redistribution follows these guidelines: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>, space is redistributed between the column that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> and the column that is to the left.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>propriedade especifica que o espaço é redistribuído entre colunas, a redistribuição segue estas diretrizes: - quando o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>estiver definida como <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>, espaço é redistribuído entre a coluna especificada para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>e a coluna que está à esquerda.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Right>, space is redistributed between the column that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> and the column that is to the right.
trans-unit.target: -Quando o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>estiver definida como <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Right>, espaço é redistribuído entre a coluna especificada para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>e a coluna que está à direita.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Right> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center>, space is redistributed between the columns that are to the left and right of the column that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
trans-unit.target: -Quando a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>propriedade é definida, o <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center>espaço é redistribuído entre as colunas que estão à esquerda e à direita da coluna que é especificada para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>, space is redistributed between the columns that are to the left and right of the column that is specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.
trans-unit.target: -Quando a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>propriedade é definida, o <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>espaço é redistribuído entre as colunas que estão à esquerda e à direita da coluna que é especificada para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the row that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> and the next row that is below it.
trans-unit.target: Um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>, espaço é redistribuído entre a linha especificada para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> e a próxima linha que está abaixo dela.

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the column that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> and the next column that is to the right.
trans-unit.target: Para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>, espaço é redistribuído entre a coluna especificada para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> e a próxima coluna que está à direita.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the row that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> and the next row that is above it.
trans-unit.target: Um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>, espaço é redistribuído entre a linha especificada para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> e a próxima linha que está acima dele.

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the column that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> and the next column that is to the left.
trans-unit.target: Para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>, espaço é redistribuído entre a coluna especificada para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> e a próxima coluna que está à esquerda.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the rows that are above and below the row that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>, espaço é redistribuído entre as linhas que estão acima e abaixo da linha que é especificada para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>, space is redistributed between the columns that are to the left and right of the column that is specified for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>, espaço é redistribuído entre as colunas que estão à esquerda e à direita da coluna especificada para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
